arm_group.description: The Phonophoresis gel will be used as placebo
Olive oil will be used as a replacement to phonophoresis gel in this arm

brief_summary.textblock:
This study is intended to evaluate the effect of olive oil phonophoresis on chronic law back
      pain in female athletes.

clinical_study.brief_title: Olive Oil Phonophoresis and Chronic Low Back

detailed_description.textblock:
This study will enroll 60 female patients suffering from chronic low back pain. the study
      will run in single blind mode that only patients will kept unaware of treatment.

      The duration of treatment is 10 days. patients will be assigned  randomly to olive oil or
      placebo group. every day, they will take phonophoresis on lower back using phonophoresis gel
      as placebo or olive oil as treatment for 10 day. the questionnaires will be filled in
      baseline visit and day 10. any side effect of drugs or technique will be recorded

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Young female athletes suffering from low back pain for more than three months

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Underlying systematic or visceral disease

          -  Specific conditions such as neoplasm and  fractures, spondylolisthesis

          -  Previous low back surgery

          -  Pregnancy

intervention.description: Phonophoresis with Olive oil for 10 day, daily
Phonophoresis with base gel for 10 days, daily

clinical_study.official_title: The Effect of Olive Oil Phonophoresis on Chronic Low Back Pain in Female Athletes: a Randomized Controlled Trial

other_outcome.description: Any occurrence of drug induced side effects will be recorded

overall_official.affiliation: Department of Pharmacology, School of Medicine, Ardabil University of Medical Sciences, Ardabil, Iran

primary_outcome.description: Low back pain intensity will be measured using McGill questionnaire from 0 (no pain) to 10 (worst).
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline in McGill Low Back Pain Scale at day 10

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: The ability of patients in doing daily activities will be measured using two qualified questionnaires
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline in Phycical Function Scale at Day 10

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Single Blind (Subject), Primary Purpose: Treatment
